EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Rep to set DNS by ODS
EmailTemplate.name: CT DNS by ODS
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c} - {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} DNS was Activated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Customer_Transition__c.OwnerFullName}:
Account number {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c}, {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} has been migrated to OD South. The OD North account has been set to Do Not Sell. No further orders can be placed on the OD North account. If the account has retail connect cards, they will be closed in 14 days. Please provide the customer with Store Purchasing Cards if needed.
Link to Customer: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c}
Thank you for your support.
BSD SALES OPERATIONS TEAM
